answers.author: Beth Howser
answers.text:
Hello!  We would love to help you!  Atkins is a Corporate Partner with ICMA and has a very strong transportation company.  One of our Senior Staff has expressed an interst in helping with your project.  You may contact him directly using the information listed below:  
Jim Hanson, P.E., PTOE
Group Manager,Transportation Planning & Traffic Engineering
ATKINS
4601 DTC Blvd., Suite 700, Denver, CO, 80237 
Tel: +1 (303) 221 7275
Cell: +1 (720) 219 7993
Email: jim.hanson@atkinsglobal.com
You may reach me at beth.howser@atkinsglobal.com.  We look forward to hearing from you!

answers.author: Beth Howser
answers.text:
Sven-we wanted to check in with you and see if you were interested in working with us on this project?  We are very excited to help and Jim hopes that he can provide you with a good ally on the project. Please let us know if we can provide additional information about our experience and ability to assit.  Thank you in advance!

author: Sven Stafford
text:
Dear ICMA,
My name is Sven Stafford and I am the director of development at the American University of Central Asia in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic. This semester I am teaching a course on public administration, and would like to have my class do semester-long research projects on traffic issues in Bishkek.
I am looking for someone who would be willing to coach me as I help the students in their research. This would involve helping to create realistic and specific research questions, advising on methodology, and helping us troubleshoot during the semester.
If you are interested, please respond and we can set up a time to Skype, and I can fill in more of the details.
Sincerely,
Sven
title: Student Research on Traffic in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic
